file_insights.security_config: Created comprehensive .auto-claude-security.json with 196 allowed base commands, stack commands for Bun/Node.js ecosystem, and detected project stack (TypeScript, Bun, Vitest, Docker)
file_insights.status_tracking: Added .auto-claude-status file showing project state: 'building', 1/41 subtasks completed, 1 in progress, active phase 'Project Setup & Environment'
file_insights.build_progress: Created detailed build-progress.txt logging system for tracking implementation phases and completed tasks
file_insights.implementation_plan: Generated comprehensive implementation_plan.json with 8 phases (37 subtasks) covering project setup, database schema, authentication, CRUD endpoints, error handling, testing, documentation, and security
file_insights.memory_management: Updated memory system with attempt_history.json, build_commits.json, session_insights for project tracking
file_insights.project_config: Modified package.json, .claude_settings.json, added data/apikeys.json and bun.lock for dependency management
file_insights.specs: Enhanced requirements.json and spec.md with detailed feature specifications for Admin API CRUD operations

patterns_discovered.modular_structure: Using .auto-claude/specs/001-admin-api-for-crud-operations/ as central project directory with organized subdirectories
patterns_discovered.json_based_tracking: Extensive use of JSON files for progress tracking, implementation planning, and session management
patterns_discovered.bun_ecosystem: Leveraging Bun runtime with bun:sqlite for database operations, bun for package management
patterns_discovered.typescript_first_approach: Prioritizing TypeScript configuration and type safety throughout the project setup
patterns_discovered.phased_implementation: Structured approach with clear phases and subtasks for systematic development
patterns_discovered.security_conscious: Early security configuration with command whitelisting and stack detection

gotchas_discovered.tsconfig_dom_types: Required adding DOM and DOM.Iterable libraries to support fetch API and browser globals in Bun environment
gotchas_discovered.bun_types_configuration: Needed proper bun-types configuration for comprehensive TypeScript support
gotchas_discovered.sqlite_bun_integration: Must use bun:sqlite for SQLite database operations in Bun runtime
gotchas_discovered.dependency_management: Existing dependencies (hono@4.11.4, vitest@4.0.17, @types/bun) need verification for compatibility
gotchas_discovered.compilation_verification: TypeScript compilation must be verified after each configuration change using bun run typecheck
gotchas_discovered.test_framework_setup: bun test command must be used for test execution with Vitest framework

approach_outcome.success_metrics: Successfully completed 2 subtasks (setup-1, setup-2) out of 41 total, achieved TypeScript compilation success, dependency installation verification
approach_outcome.project_ready: Project is now ready for Phase 1 implementation with proper directory structure, dependencies, and TypeScript configuration
approach_outcome.tracking_system: Established comprehensive progress tracking with build-progress.txt and JSON-based memory system
approach_outcome.next_steps: Ready to proceed with Phase 1 subtasks setup-3 and setup-4 (environment configuration and directory structure)
approach_outcome.architecture_decisions: Decided on Bun + TypeScript + SQLite stack, RESTful API design principles, comprehensive testing approach

recommendations.continue_phase_1: Complete remaining Phase 1 subtasks (setup-3, setup-4) before moving to database schema implementation
recommendations.security_validation: Regularly review .auto-claude-security.json permissions as new dependencies are added
recommendations.testing_strategy: Implement unit tests alongside development to ensure API endpoint functionality
recommendations.documentation: Maintain API documentation throughout development using OpenAPI/Swagger specifications
recommendations.performance_considerations: Plan for database indexes early in Phase 2 to ensure query performance
recommendations.error_handling: Design comprehensive error response format early in Phase 5 to maintain consistency
recommendations.auth_strategy: Consider using JWT or secure token-based authentication for admin API endpoints
